foreignData.name: Erbin des uralten Fangzahns
foreignData.text: Die Erbin des uralten Fangzahns kommt mit einer +1/+1-Marke ins Spiel, falls du eine modifizierte Kreatur kontrollierst.

foreignData.name: Heredera del colmillo antiguo
foreignData.text: La Heredera del colmillo antiguo entra al campo de batalla con un contador +1/+1 sobre ella si controlas una criatura modificada.

foreignData.name: Héritière du Croc ancien
foreignData.text: L'Héritière du Croc ancien arrive sur le champ de bataille avec un marqueur +1/+1 sur elle si vous contrôlez une créature modifiée.

foreignData.name: Erede dell'Antica Zanna
foreignData.text: L'Erede dell'Antica Zanna entra nel campo di battaglia con un segnalino +1/+1 se controlli una creatura modificata.

foreignData.name: 古の牙を継ぐ者
foreignData.text: あなたが改善されているクリーチャーをコントロールしているなら、古の牙を継ぐ者は、＋１/＋１カウンター１個が置かれた状態で戦場に出る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 蛇・侍

foreignData.name: 고대의 송곳니의 후예
foreignData.text: 고대의 송곳니의 후예는 당신이 수정된 생물을 조종한다면 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 가지고 전장에 들어온다.

foreignData.name: Herdeiro da Presa Antiga
foreignData.text: Herdeiro da Presa Antiga entra no campo de batalha com um marcador +1/+1 se você controla uma criatura modificada.

foreignData.name: Наследница Древнего Клыка
foreignData.text: Наследница Древнего Клыка выходит на поле битвы с одним жетоном +1/+1 на ней, если вы контролируете измененное существо.

foreignData.name: 古牙传人
foreignData.text: 如果你操控有饰装的生物，则古牙传人进战场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。

foreignData.name: 古牙傳人
foreignData.text: 如果你操控有飾裝的生物，則古牙傳人進戰場時上面有一個+1/+1指示物。

name: Heir of the Ancient Fang
originalText: Heir of the Ancient Fang enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you control a modified creature.

rulings.text: An Aura controlled by an opponent does not cause a creature you control to be modified.
A creature with a counter on it is considered modified no matter what kind of counter it is or which player put it on that creature.
A creature that is equipped is considered modified no matter who controls the Equipment that's attached to it.
Only creatures can be modified. If a modified creature stops being a creature, it is no longer considered modified.

text: Heir of the Ancient Fang enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you control a modified creature. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
